name: 3D Acquisition Type
description: Use 3D acquisition instead of 2D acquisition to avoid potential slice-to-slice phase discontinuities in 2D phase maps.
implementation:
acquisition_type = value["MRAcquisitionType"].iloc[0]  # Assuming consistent within group
if acquisition_type != "3D":
    raise ValidationError(f"The input data is not 3D. Found {acquisition_type}.")
return value
